segments.text: Hi , Celia ! How was your trip to the United States ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was terrific . I really enjoyed it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . How long were you away ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was there for about three weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a long time ! Was the weather OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , most of the time . But it snowed a lot in Chicago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , what was the best thing about your trip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's difficult to say . But I guess I liked Nashville the best .
segments.speaker: S2
